public abstract class DiscoveryFactory
extends Object

Factory class for creating discovery implementations.

Method Detail

getInstance

public static DiscoveryFactory getInstance()
Gets the DiscoveryFactory instance.

Returns:
a DiscoveryFactory implementation

init

public abstract void init(UserRegistration registration,
                          PeerDiscovery discovery)
Inits this DiscoveryFactory (optional). If init is not called, default implementations will be used. This method is actually intended for testability.

Parameters:
registration - the UserRegistration implementation
discovery - the PeerDiscovery implementation

createDiscovery

public abstract Discovery createDiscovery(DiscoveryCallback callback,
                                          Object auxiliary)
Creates a new discovery implementation.

Parameters:
callback - the DiscoveryCallback for the discovery
auxiliary - an auxiliary object depending on the discovery implementation
Returns:
an instance of a Discovery implementation
